attributes.action: Do not intervene militarily in Iraq - "Not in My Name"
attributes.additional_details:
Having recently extracted ourselves from middle eastern countries, there are calls for the UK and US to intervene as ISIS takes control of parts of Iraq.

This petition proposes that the government should not be permitted to intervene militarily, no matter what the US chooses to do.  We must stay out, not get involved in drone strikes or provide air support.   Humanitarian Aid is all that we should offer.
